## Grid interface

Public API for grid

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface Grid 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [gridOptions](./grid.grid.gridoptions.md) | <code>GridOptions</code> | Gets or sets grid options |
|  [initialized](./grid.grid.initialized.md) | <code>Observable&lt;boolean&gt;</code> | Occurs every time when grid is initialized or reinitialized, if value is false grid was not initialized yet |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [execute(actions)](./grid.grid.execute.md) | Executes actions on grid |
|  [executeAndReturn(func)](./grid.grid.executeandreturn.md) | Executes function on grid and returns result |
|  [getPlugin(pluginId)](./grid.grid.getplugin.md) | Gets instance of plugin by its id |
|  [initialize()](./grid.grid.initialize.md) | Initialize component, automatically called once if not blocked by options |
|  [initOptions()](./grid.grid.initoptions.md) | Initialize options, automaticaly called during init phase, but can be used to reinitialize GridOptions |
|  [invalidateVisuals()](./grid.grid.invalidatevisuals.md) | Explicitly runs invalidation of content (change detection) |
